>
[Basic Chair](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1355)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 70, [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 91</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This common [wheelchair](/Rules.aspx?ID=1634) is ideal for everyday use but isn't designed for strenuous activity. Basic chairs are most common among non-adventurers.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
